messages.content: Help Nigel Jones stop a hard Brexit. The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight to protect Britain against the Conservatives' reckless Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keep Britain in the single market
Improve funding for our NHS and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our local services are already planning cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop the cuts in school budgets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Staff in local schools are already being made redundant.
People in Newcastle struggle with housing costs.
Inequality in Newcastle is too great and the poorest are suffering more.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for our economy, against hard Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have always fought for Britain's membership of the EU while working for its reform.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Standing up for NHS and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats would give £6 billion a year nationally for NHS, Care and Public Health Services, funded by a dedicated 1p on income tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in quality education for all
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The current squeeze on school budgets is at least 8% drop in per-pupil spending.

issues.brexitEurope: Help Nigel Jones stop a hard Brexit. The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight to protect Britain against the Conservatives' reckless Brexit.
issues.economy: Keep Britain in the single market otherwise our economy will suffer. A fairer nation, outward-looking, working with our partners in Europe and beyond to create trade, proper jobs and reduce inequality.
issues.education: Stop the cuts in school budgets. Staff in local schools are already being made redundant. The current squeeze on school budgets is at least 8% drop in per-pupil spending.
issues.environment: We will work with EU and other nations to tackle climate change and create a greener and safer planet.
issues.health: Improve funding for our NHS and Social Care. Our local services are already planning cuts. Liberal Democrats would give £6 billion a year nationally for NHS, Care and Public Health Services, funded by a dedicated 1p on income tax.

community.content: Provide more affordable housing. People in Newcastle struggle with housing costs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Nigel has lived in Newcastle serving people as a local councillor. He is part of a team that ran the council and improved it tremendously. He is an active campaigner, national chair of Transport Education Association, and has worked as a teacher.

politicalExperience.achievements: Part of a team that ran the council and made it one of the most improved in England.

quotes.text: No Brexit that hits people's pockets

examples: Staff in local schools are already being made redundant.
Liberal Democrats would give £6 billion a year nationally for NHS, Care and Public Health Services, funded by a dedicated 1p on income tax.

personalStories.story: Nigel has lived in Newcastle serving people as a local councillor. He is part of a team that ran the council and improved it tremendously. He is an active campaigner, national chair of Transport Education Association, and has worked as a teacher.

examples: The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight to protect Britain against the Conservatives' reckless Brexit.
